CaseProceedingParticipant.name: CaseProceedingParticipant
CaseProceedingParticipant.description: Represents a junction between the case proceeding and a participant, such as an account or a contact. This object stores the details of a participant who is involved in a case proceeding.

CaseProceedingId.description: The case proceeding associated with the case proceeding participant record.

Comments.description: The comments about why the participant has access to the case proceeding.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the participant's association with the case proceeding is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the case proceeding participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant associated with the case proceeding record.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The participant role associated with the case proceeding participant record.

ParticipationType.description: The actual type of presence of the participant during the case proceeding.

Role.description: The role of the participant associated with the case proceeding record.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the participant in the case proceeding.
